EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Vancouver Canucks Vs. Winnipeg Jets - 10/12/2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://turbonomic.com/vancouver-community/> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
I am pleased to invite to you an exclusive event on October 12th, for an evening of food, drinks and Canucks Hockey!
We are partnering with our friends at Cisco to bring excellent technology, customer service and good times to our friends in Vancouver.
I hope you will accept this invitation as you consider becoming part of the Turbonomic family, so that we can get to know our community even better. Vancouver Community Event <[[https://turbonomic.com/vancouver-community/]]> Roger Arena: 800 Griffiths Way Vancouver, BC Thursday, October 12th, 7:00pm
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best,
The Turbonomic Team
